testcase.name: Login to ATS Dashboard
testcase.system-out: Given Login to system with "https://teamso.com/dashboard/account/login" and "kadir.mogul@teamso.com" and "prodkadir" and "0" and "Akm@2026".passed Then verify login successful................................................passed And Select menu "Aday Takip Sistemi" and sub-menu "6".......................passed And verify page opened successfully.........................................passed And find parameter name at index "0"........................................passed And find record number at index "0".........................................passed And find option id with text "Detay"........................................passed
